keys: comprensión de lectura y que escucha

          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">A Family Tree 1</string>
            <string language="en">A Family Tree 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Stammbaum 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un Arbre de Famille 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma Árvore De Família 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un Albero Di Famiglia 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα οικογενειακό δέντρο 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un Árbol De Familia 1</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Read and listen to a text that describes a family. A picture of a family tree will help you to understand the text.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 5 - Who Are You?</string>
            <string language="en">Read and listen to a text that describes a family. A picture of a family tree will help you to understand the text. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 5 - Who Are You?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">family</string>
            <string language="sv">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="sv">reading and listening comprehension</string>
            <string language="sv">tree</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">family</string>
            <string language="en">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="en">reading and listening comprehension</string>
            <string language="en">tree</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesen Sie und hören Sie zu einem Text, der eine 
Familie beschreibt. Eine Abbildung eines Stammbaums hilft Ihnen,
den Text zu verstehen. Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben für 
Anfänger - Modul 5 - die Sie sind?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lisez et écoutez un texte qui décrit une 
famille. Une image d'un arbre de famille vous aidera à 
comprendre le texte. Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour les 
débutants - module 5 - qui sont vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Leia e escute um texto que descreva uma família.
Um retrato de uma árvore de família ajudar-lhe-á compreender 
o texto. Safir - vida do inglês e de funcionamento para os 
novatos - módulo 5 - que são você?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Legga ed ascolti un testo che descrive una 
famiglia. Un'immagine di un albero di famiglia li aiuterà a 
capire il testo. Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i 
principianti - modulo 5 - che sono voi?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαβάστε και ακούστε ένα κείμενο που περιγράφει μια 
οικογένεια. Μια εικόνα ενός οικογενειακού δέντρου θα σας 
βοηθήσει για να καταλάβει το κείμενο. Safir - αγγλική 
και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 5 - που 
είναι εσείς;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lea y escuche un texto que describa a familia. 
Un cuadro de un árbol de familia le ayudará a entender el 
texto. ¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral para los principiantes - 
módulo 5 - que son usted?</string>
          </description>
